name: The Block Pro
title: The Block Researchs Analysts 2025 Predictions
text:
Synopsis
The crypto market in Q1 2025 is expected to face challenges with inflated expectations around monetary policy and regulation, while maintaining active fundraising and venture deployment.

Key Insights
- Q1 2025 is predicted to be disappointing from a price perspective for cryptocurrencies
- Bitcoin (BTC) price is expected to continue trading in line with broader macro assets
- Fundraising and venture capital deployment will remain active despite market challenges
- Notable blockchain developments in 2024 include:
  - L2 governance token airdrops
  - Bitcoin-based Ordinals NFTs making waves in Q1
  - Ronin blockchain emerging as the 4th most used blockchain by active addresses and transaction count
- The NFT market has become more subdued, moving past the earlier era of explosive growth and speculation
